DOC.brief_summary: This pilot project study repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( rTMS ) benefit patient bipolar depression safely . Based published study , study hypothesizes rTMS leave dorsal prefrontal lobe improve symptom patient fail least two medication .
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( rTMS ) Treatment Bipolar Depression
DOC.detailed_description: Candidate bipolar depression screen sign informed consent . Those meet selection criterion treat daily rTMS 3 week followed-up 2 week . Participants keep ongoing medication unless medication significantly increase possibility seizure . They must dose antidepressant medication least 4 week without improvement symptom recruit study . Mood observe mental status measure standard psychological scale .
